definition: to fall/meteor/to perish/see also 殞|殒[yun3]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Enemies hit by meteors are knocked down, 25 second recharge.
sentences.chinese: 被隕石雨擊中的敵人將倒地，25秒回覆。

sentences.english: And it's from meteoroids that we get meteors and meteorites.
sentences.chinese: 流星和隕石也是來自流星體中。

sentences.english: Investigation and collection of the Aerolite.
sentences.chinese: 隕石的研究和收藏等若干章節。

sentences.english: They were listening to an expert who is in charge of meteorites at the Smithsonian.
sentences.chinese: 他們在聽專家講解，她是史密斯松寧主管隕石的專家。

sentences.english: The impact that made this crater likely almost destroyed Mimas.
sentences.chinese: 隕石坑所產生的影響，幾乎可以摧毀整個的土衛一。

sentences.english: I close the meteorite room and try the door across thecorridor.
sentences.chinese: 我關上隕石房間的門，又打開了走廊對面的門。

sentences.english: Meteorites are asteroid fragments that fall to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 隕石是掉落地球的小行星殘骸。

sentences.english: The meteorite which devastated Tunguska is now estimated to have been about 50 metres across.
sentences.chinese: 據猜測，毀滅通古斯的隕石的直徑有近50英里。

sentences.english: A stone of meteoric origin characterized by chondrules.
sentences.chinese: 球粒隕石的或與之相關的。

sentences.english: Maby a big rock heat the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 也許是巨大的隕石擊中地球。

sentences.english: Or it could be because the K-T boundary that marks the geologic end of the dinosaurs is laced with iridium; the metal is more common in asteroids and meteorites than in the Earth’s crust.
sentences.chinese: 與地殼相比，這種金屬在小行星和隕石中更常見。

sentences.english: No one knows why there is aerolite from the sky.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人知道爲什麼會有隕石從天而降。

sentences.english: Call down a meteor shower on target location.
sentences.chinese: 在目標位置創造隕石雨。

sentences.english: The metal-sulfide phase of previous melting experimental results of Zhaodong chondrite was observed and analysed again.
sentences.chinese: 並與先前肇東隕石全巖樣的高壓熔融實驗進行比較。

sentences.english: This article deals with the major typomorphic characteristics of Boxian meteorite.
sentences.chinese: 詳細地研究了亳縣隕石中的主要標型特徵。

sentences.english: There was, of course, the fusion crust, indisputable evidence that it came from space.
sentences.chinese: 地上靜靜躺着的分明就是來自太空有熔殼的隕石。

definition: shaking one to the core/extremely disturbing/hair-raising (idiom)
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
